bestIdea.name: The Bayou of Louisiana
bestIdea.description: Explore the mysterious and enchanting swamps of Louisiana, where the air is thick with humidity and the sounds of wildlife echo through the cypress trees. This journey takes you through the heart of the bayou, offering a glimpse into the unique ecosystem and culture of the region.

possibleSteps.endingLocation: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve

possibleSteps.startingLocation: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve

otherIdeas.name: The Everglades Expedition
otherIdeas.description: Traverse the vast and diverse wetlands of the Florida Everglades, home to a rich array of wildlife and unique landscapes. This journey offers an immersive experience into one of the most famous swamps in the world.

otherIdeas.name: The Swamps of Dagobah
otherIdeas.description: Venture into the murky and mysterious swamps of Dagobah, the remote planet known for its dense fog and twisted trees. This journey takes you through the iconic setting where Jedi Master Yoda once lived.
